column4: Does anybody know why don`t my mp3`s play, and I installed gstreamer.
I wasn't sure if you were referring to gstreamer0.8-mad
if one mp3 plays then you can play mp3's
I managed to play that mp3 with RythmBox
so you can only play one mp3 out of your whole collection?  what happens with the other ones?
I don't know, I can't understand how one can play.  I would think it would be all or nothing
shouldn't, that gstreamer0.8-mad package is all you need to play mp3's
can you reccomend me a command line mp3 player?
